summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A TEGOL MOTORCYCLE HELMET, MODEL: V5-18. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 13E047000 (EQUIPMENT). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 866-371-0281 APPROXIMATELY TWO MONTHS AGO. THE CONTACT LEFT THE REQUIRED VOICEMAIL FOR A CALL BACK, BUT HAD NOT RECEIVED A RESPONSE. THE CONTACT FELT THAT A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME HAD PASSED FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
